SMW Subobject for UnderwaterNPC location: UnderwaterUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 6751Examine: A very strange old man.Release date: 15 March 2006Image: File:Mysterious Old Man (underwater).pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Mysterious Old Man

The Mysterious Old Man is a man who can teleport you to the Maze and Mime random event, or just hands out items in a similar way to Rick Turpentine to Free-to-play players. In the Maze random event you must complete the labyrinth as quickly as possible (for better rewards), and in the Mime random event you need to copy the movements of the mime artist.

A player interacting with the Mysterious Old Man.

Before the Optional Randoms update, would also occasionally give the player a strange box instead of teleporting them off to the Maze or the Mime, unless their inventory was full. The strange box presented the player with a puzzle asking them which shape contains which number or which number is in which shape. The rewards from this random could be very generous, as you could get a half key from the Mysterious prize box. The man obtained these boxes from a village in the Eastern Lands.[1]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The NPC was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Mysterious Old Man appeared before the Bandits of the Golden Claw on two occasions. During the first he appeared before the group, who were not sure how he got into the cave system, only leaving after Davey spoke to him.[3] On the second occasion, the group ignored the Mysterious Old Man, resulting in them being teleported away.[4]
  • If the Mysterious Old Man spawns underwater, he will be wearing diving gear.
  • If the Mysterious Old Man spawns underwater, members can also receive a singular item akin to how he works for free-to-play players.
  • The Mysterious Old Man can be found upstairs in a house in eastern Falador, saying he is trying to solve a puzzle-cube and that he is retired.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 1 - "Transcript:Poultry, Dragons and Zombies", Letter 9, by Mysterious Old Man. RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 16 October 2020. (Archived from the original on 18 October 2020.) Mod Ash: "2/75. Same for Mysterious Old Man, by the way."
  3. ^ Arthur Artimus, "Feathered journal", Old School RuneScape. "A mysterious old man turned up today. Not sure how he got in. Kept pestering us until eventually Davey spoke to him, at which point he offloaded a load of spinach rolls onto us then left."
  4. ^ Arthur Artimus, "Feathered journal", Old School RuneScape. "That mysterious old man has turned up again. We don't have time for this, quite frankly, so we're just going to ignore him, after all what could be possibl..."
